name: 001 Praise to the Lord
description:
1
  Praise to the Lord, the Almighty, the King of creation! 
  O my soul, praise Him, for He is thy health and salvation!
  All ye who hear, now to His temple draw near;
  Join ye in glad adoration!

 2
  Praise to the Lord, Who o'er all things so wondrously reigneth,
  Shieldeth thee under His wings, yea, so gently sustaineth!
  Hast thou not seen how thy desires e'er have been  Granted in what He ordaineth?
 
3
Praise to the Lord, who doth prosper thy work and defend thee;
Surely His goodness and mercy here daily attend thee.
 Ponder anew what the Almighty can do,
If with His love He befriend thee.

name: 002 All creatures of our God and King
description:
1
  All creatures of our God and King,
  Lift up your voice with us and sing:
  Alleluia! Alleluia!
  O burning sun with golden beam
  And silver moon with softer gleam:
   
   	Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!
 	 	Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!
 
 
2
  O rushing wind and breezes soft,
  O clouds that ride the winds aloft:
  Oh, praise Him! Alleluia!
  O rising morn, in praise rejoice,
  O lights of evening, find a voice.

	Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!
   Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!


3
  O flowing waters, pure and clear,
  Make music for your Lord to hear.
  Oh praise Him! Alleluia!
  O fire so masterful and bright,
  Providing us with warmth and light.

		Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!
  		Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!
 
4
  Let all things their Creator bless,
  And worship him in humbleness,
  O praise him Alleluia!
  Oh, praise the Father, praise the Son,
  And praise the Spirit, three in One!

		Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!
  		Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

name: 003 GOD HIMSELF IS WITH US
description:
1.
God Himself is with us;
Let us all adore Him,
And with awe appear before Him.
God is here within us;
Soul in silence fear Him, 
Humbly, fervently draw near Him.
Now His own who have known God, 
In worship lowly,
Yield their spirits wholly.

2.
Come, abide within me;
Let my soul, like Mary,
Be Thine earthly sanctuary.
Come, indwelling Spirit,
With transfigured splendor;
Love and honor will I render.
Where I go here below, let me bow before Thee,
Know Thee and adore Thee.

3.
Gladly we surrender
Earth's deceitful treasures,
Pride of life, and sinful pleasures:
Lord, we offer Thine to be forever,
Soul and life and each endeavor. 
Thou alone shalt be known
Lord of all our being,
Life's true way decreeing.

name: 004 Praise, My Soul, the King of Heaven
description:
1
  Praise, my soul, the King of heaven; To His feet thy tribute bring. Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven, Who like thee His praise should sing? 
  Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,
  Praise the everlasting King.
   2
  Praise Him for His grace and favor To our fathers in distress.  Praise Him, still the same forever,  Slow to chide and swift to bless;   Praise Him, praise Him,Alleluia,Glorious in His faithfulness.
 
 

 3
  Tenderly He shields and spares us; Well our feeble frame He knows. In His hands He gently bears us,  Rescues us from all our foes.
  Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,
  Widely as His mercy flows.
 
  4
  Angels, help us to adore Him:   Ye behold Him face to face;   Sun and moon, bow down before Him:   Dwellers all in time and space. Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,  Praise with us the God of grace.

name: HEALTH MINISTRIES
description: Health Ministries of Newlife Church is not only about assisting our members with living healthier, happier lives; it is also is concerned with the physical, mental, social, and spiritual health of the church and our community. This is done through Seminars, Life Improvement programs, Prayer Meetings, Small Study Groups, Member Training for Service.

name: MUSIC MINISTRIES
description: Music Ministries department of Newlife Church provides musical support for all worship services and church events, as well as coordinates and hosts special concerts to share the everlasting gospel through wholesome, high-quality Christian music.

name: ADVENTIST YOUTH MINISTRIES
description: Adventist Youth Ministries: Youth Ministry AAYP, Ambassadors, Adventurers & Pathfinder) of Newlife Church is about connecting high school and college students with God. We seek to do this through Bible study, youth choir, and special programs.

name: PATHFINDERS CLUB
description: Pathfinders are a worldwide organization of young people sponsored by the Seventh-day Adventist Church, though young people of any religious persuasion, or none at all, are welcome and encouraged to join the organization.

name: ADVENTURERS CLUB
description: The Adventurers serves to support parents and care-givers in leading and encouraging their children in a growing, joyful love relationship with Jesus Christ. It offers instructional curriculum, family enrichment, supplementary resources, and volunteer training from within the Seventh-Day Adventist philosophy.

name: ADVENTIST MEN’S ORGANISATION
description: Adventist Men's Ministry of Newlife Church serves to meet the spiritual needs of the men in the church through prayer and fellowship. Newlife AMO helps men realize their spiritual gifts through Bible study and challenge them to understand the need for being great spiritual role models and witnesses for Christ.

name: PERSONAL MINISTRIES
description: Personal Ministries of Newlife Church endeavours to inspire, motivate, equip, train and mobilize all members for dynamic Christian service with the conviction that “The church of Christ is organised for service”.

name: PRAYER MINISTRY
description: Prayer Ministry of Newlife Church is for adults, teens, prayer coordinators and pastors providing experiences and training in prayer and small groups to under gird evangelism, pastoral ministry and education.

name: WOMEN MINISTRY
description: Women’s Ministries of Newlife Church facilitates women meeting other women for the purpose of making new friendships or renewing old ones. It is our desire to experience personal growth and deepen our faith and relationship with Jesus Christ.

name: VOICE OF PROPHECY
description: Newlife Seventh-day Adventist Church VOIP Ministry brings members into the church, thus it made a way for non-members to meet Jesus, learn much about Him, and become prepared for the end of the world and for the Second Advent of Jesus.

name: The Church Clerk
description: The office of the church clerk is one of the important church offices, upon the proper administration of which the much of the efficient functioning of the church depends.

name: Elders Council
description: General Support for all church related ministries. Opportunities may be further defined by individual ministries.

name: The Treasury
description: Acts as steward of all the money contributed to the local church and the Central Kenya Conference of Seventh-day Adventist Church.

name: Deacons & Deaconesses
description: Through their leadership and service, the Deacon and Deaconess Ministry teaches everyone that it is an honor and a privilege to perform God’s work - by serving our neighbors and inviting them into a relationship with Christ.

name: The Adult Sabbath School
description: Every week small groups get together to share what they learned from the lesson and how it has made a difference in their lives.

name: Education Department
description: Education Ministries of Newlife Church helps to educate our members and community on the importance of Christian education within the classroom, home, and extended families.

name: Communications Department
description: Communications Ministries of Newlife Church aims to effectively communicate both the gospel message and the activities of the Newlife Church in a consistent, easy-to-understand fashion through a variety of mediums.

name: Publishing Department
description: Publishing Ministries of Newlife Church exists to proclaim the eternal gospel hope to the world in this generation through the use of publications, including new media.

name: Religious Liberty
description: The mission of Religious Liberty Ministry of Newlife Church is to champion the God-given principle of religious liberty. We are dedicated to free choice in matters of faith, religion and conscience.

name: Stewardship Department
description: Stewardship Ministries of Newlife Church is helping believers become Disciples of Christ in the use of all the resources God has provided. This includes the management of one’s body, material possessions, abilities and time.

name: CHILDREN'S MINISTRIES
description: Children's Ministries of Newlife Church strives to provide multiple ministries that will lead children to Jesus and disciple them in their daily walk with Him. It aims to develop the faith of children ages birth to 14.

name: COMMUNITY SERVICE MINISTRY
description: Community Service Ministry service team of Newlife Church has a passion for assisting those in need. We do this providing blessing of food donations and clothing to the community around us and groups like prisoners in our Chaplaincy Ministries.

name: FAMILY LIFE MINISTRIES
description: Family Life Ministries of Newlife Church works to develop resources, coordinate and promote training events, and provide networking opportunities for those who work on behalf of families.

name: HEALTH MINISTRIES
description: Health Ministries of Newlife Church is not only about assisting our members with living healthier, happier lives; it is also is concerned with the physical, mental, social, and spiritual health of the church and our community. This is done through Seminars, Life Improvement programs, Prayer Meetings, Small Study Groups, Member Training for Service.

description: General Support for all church related ministries. Opportunities may be further defined by individual ministries.

name: The Treasury
description: Acts as steward of all the money contributed to the local church and the Central Kenya Conference of Seventh-day Adventist Church.

name: Deacons & Deaconesses
description: Through their leadership and service, the Deacon and Deaconess Ministry teaches everyone that it is an honor and a privilege to perform God’s work - by serving our neighbors and inviting them into a relationship with Christ.

name: The Adult Sabbath School
description: Every week small groups get together to share what they learned from the lesson and how it has made a difference in their lives.

name: Education Department
description: Education Ministries of Newlife Church helps to educate our members and community on the importance of Christian education within the classroom, home, and extended families.

name: Communications Department
description: Communications Ministries of Newlife Church aims to effectively communicate both the gospel message and the activities of the Newlife Church in a consistent, easy-to-understand fashion through a variety of mediums.

name: Publishing Department
description: Publishing Ministries of Newlife Church exists to proclaim the eternal gospel hope to the world in this generation through the use of publications, including new media.

name: Religious Liberty
description: The mission of Religious Liberty Ministry of Newlife Church is to champion the God-given principle of religious liberty. We are dedicated to free choice in matters of faith, religion and conscience.

name: Stewardship Department
description: Stewardship Ministries of Newlife Church is helping believers become Disciples of Christ in the use of all the resources God has provided. This includes the management of one’s body, material possessions, abilities and time.

name: CHILDREN'S MINISTRIES
description: Children's Ministries of Newlife Church strives to provide multiple ministries that will lead children to Jesus and disciple them in their daily walk with Him. It aims to develop the faith of children ages birth to 14.

name: COMMUNITY SERVICE MINISTRY
description: Community Service Ministry service team of Newlife Church has a passion for assisting those in need. We do this providing blessing of food donations and clothing to the community around us and groups like prisoners in our Chaplaincy Ministries.

name: FAMILY LIFE MINISTRIES
description: Family Life Ministries of Newlife Church works to develop resources, coordinate and promote training events, and provide networking opportunities for those who work on behalf of families.

name: HEALTH MINISTRIES
description: Health Ministries of Newlife Church is not only about assisting our members with living healthier, happier lives; it is also is concerned with the physical, mental, social, and spiritual health of the church and our community. This is done through Seminars, Life Improvement programs, Prayer Meetings, Small Study Groups, Member Training for Service.

name: MUSIC MINISTRIES
description: Music Ministries department of Newlife Church provides musical support for all worship services and church events, as well as coordinates and hosts special concerts to share the everlasting gospel through wholesome, high-quality Christian music.

name: ADVENTIST YOUTH MINISTRIES
description: Adventist Youth Ministries: Youth Ministry AAYP, Ambassadors, Adventurers & Pathfinder) of Newlife Church is about connecting high school and college students with God. We seek to do this through Bible study, youth choir, and special programs.

name: PATHFINDERS CLUB
description: Pathfinders are a worldwide organization of young people sponsored by the Seventh-day Adventist Church, though young people of any religious persuasion, or none at all, are welcome and encouraged to join the organization.

name: ADVENTURERS CLUB
description: The Adventurers serves to support parents and care-givers in leading and encouraging their children in a growing, joyful love relationship with Jesus Christ. It offers instructional curriculum, family enrichment, supplementary resources, and volunteer training from within the Seventh-Day Adventist philosophy.

name: ADVENTIST MEN’S ORGANISATION
description: Adventist Men's Ministry of Newlife Church serves to meet the spiritual needs of the men in the church through prayer and fellowship. Newlife AMO helps men realize their spiritual gifts through Bible study and challenge them to understand the need for being great spiritual role models and witnesses for Christ.

name: PERSONAL MINISTRIES
description: Personal Ministries of Newlife Church endeavours to inspire, motivate, equip, train and mobilize all members for dynamic Christian service with the conviction that “The church of Christ is organised for service”.

name: PRAYER MINISTRY
description: Prayer Ministry of Newlife Church is for adults, teens, prayer coordinators and pastors providing experiences and training in prayer and small groups to under gird evangelism, pastoral ministry and education.

name: WOMEN MINISTRY
description: Women’s Ministries of Newlife Church facilitates women meeting other women for the purpose of making new friendships or renewing old ones. It is our desire to experience personal growth and deepen our faith and relationship with Jesus Christ.

name: VOICE OF PROPHECY
description: Newlife Seventh-day Adventist Church VOIP Ministry brings members into the church, thus it made a way for non-members to meet Jesus, learn much about Him, and become prepared for the end of the world and for the Second Advent of Jesus.

name: The Church Clerk
description: The office of the church clerk is one of the important church offices, upon the proper administration of which the much of the efficient functioning of the church depends.

description: Community Service Ministry service team of Newlife Church has a passion for assisting those in need. We do this providing blessing of food donations and clothing to the community around us and groups like prisoners in our Chaplaincy Ministries.

name: FAMILY LIFE MINISTRIES
description: Family Life Ministries of Newlife Church works to develop resources, coordinate and promote training events, and provide networking opportunities for those who work on behalf of families.

name: HEALTH MINISTRIES
description: Health Ministries of Newlife Church is not only about assisting our members with living healthier, happier lives; it is also is concerned with the physical, mental, social, and spiritual health of the church and our community. This is done through Seminars, Life Improvement programs, Prayer Meetings, Small Study Groups, Member Training for Service.

name: MUSIC MINISTRIES
description: Music Ministries department of Newlife Church provides musical support for all worship services and church events, as well as coordinates and hosts special concerts to share the everlasting gospel through wholesome, high-quality Christian music.

name: ADVENTIST YOUTH MINISTRIES
description: Adventist Youth Ministries: Youth Ministry AAYP, Ambassadors, Adventurers & Pathfinder) of Newlife Church is about connecting high school and college students with God. We seek to do this through Bible study, youth choir, and special programs.

name: PATHFINDERS CLUB
description: Pathfinders are a worldwide organization of young people sponsored by the Seventh-day Adventist Church, though young people of any religious persuasion, or none at all, are welcome and encouraged to join the organization.

name: ADVENTURERS CLUB
description: The Adventurers serves to support parents and care-givers in leading and encouraging their children in a growing, joyful love relationship with Jesus Christ. It offers instructional curriculum, family enrichment, supplementary resources, and volunteer training from within the Seventh-Day Adventist philosophy.

name: ADVENTIST MEN’S ORGANISATION
description: Adventist Men's Ministry of Newlife Church serves to meet the spiritual needs of the men in the church through prayer and fellowship. Newlife AMO helps men realize their spiritual gifts through Bible study and challenge them to understand the need for being great spiritual role models and witnesses for Christ.

name: PERSONAL MINISTRIES
description: Personal Ministries of Newlife Church endeavours to inspire, motivate, equip, train and mobilize all members for dynamic Christian service with the conviction that “The church of Christ is organised for service”.

name: PRAYER MINISTRY
description: Prayer Ministry of Newlife Church is for adults, teens, prayer coordinators and pastors providing experiences and training in prayer and small groups to under gird evangelism, pastoral ministry and education.

name: WOMEN MINISTRY
description: Women’s Ministries of Newlife Church facilitates women meeting other women for the purpose of making new friendships or renewing old ones. It is our desire to experience personal growth and deepen our faith and relationship with Jesus Christ.

name: VOICE OF PROPHECY
description: Newlife Seventh-day Adventist Church VOIP Ministry brings members into the church, thus it made a way for non-members to meet Jesus, learn much about Him, and become prepared for the end of the world and for the Second Advent of Jesus.

name: The Church Clerk
description: The office of the church clerk is one of the important church offices, upon the proper administration of which the much of the efficient functioning of the church depends.

name: Elders Council
description: General Support for all church related ministries. Opportunities may be further defined by individual ministries.

name: The Treasury
description: Acts as steward of all the money contributed to the local church and the Central Kenya Conference of Seventh-day Adventist Church.

name: Deacons & Deaconesses
description: Through their leadership and service, the Deacon and Deaconess Ministry teaches everyone that it is an honor and a privilege to perform God’s work - by serving our neighbors and inviting them into a relationship with Christ.

name: The Adult Sabbath School
description: Every week small groups get together to share what they learned from the lesson and how it has made a difference in their lives.

name: Education Department
description: Education Ministries of Newlife Church helps to educate our members and community on the importance of Christian education within the classroom, home, and extended families.

name: Communications Department
description: Communications Ministries of Newlife Church aims to effectively communicate both the gospel message and the activities of the Newlife Church in a consistent, easy-to-understand fashion through a variety of mediums.

name: Publishing Department
description: Publishing Ministries of Newlife Church exists to proclaim the eternal gospel hope to the world in this generation through the use of publications, including new media.

name: Religious Liberty
description: The mission of Religious Liberty Ministry of Newlife Church is to champion the God-given principle of religious liberty. We are dedicated to free choice in matters of faith, religion and conscience.

name: Stewardship Department
description: Stewardship Ministries of Newlife Church is helping believers become Disciples of Christ in the use of all the resources God has provided. This includes the management of one’s body, material possessions, abilities and time.

name: CHILDREN'S MINISTRIES
description: Children's Ministries of Newlife Church strives to provide multiple ministries that will lead children to Jesus and disciple them in their daily walk with Him. It aims to develop the faith of children ages birth to 14.

name: COMMUNITY SERVICE MINISTRY
description: Community Service Ministry service team of Newlife Church has a passion for assisting those in need. We do this providing blessing of food donations and clothing to the community around us and groups like prisoners in our Chaplaincy Ministries.
